page.title: 01THE MALVERN LINK AREA
page.content: This area is primarily residential with a mixture of older Victorian properties and modern estates being built for the commuter population. The remainder of the area is made up from commercial land-use and the hills themselves. Tourism is playing an increasingly important part in the area, both with the re-opening of Malvern as a spa and the connection between the hills and the music of Edward Elgar. Industry is based on small factories, some catering for specialist markets eg. Morgan Motors. The Royal Signals Radar Establishment provides a lot of local employment. There is a thriving local sports scene although there are relatively few facilities for general public use.
